name: Bowling with Words
description:
Play Bowling with Words!

Play this Addictive Words Puzzle Game, with beautiful icy levels!

ALL THREE LETTER WORDS

HOW TO PLAY:
Simply tap the screen with your finger to throw bowling balls at the pins.
Each pin has a letter. When you shoot down the pins in the right order to complete the word, you finish the level and get score.

FEATURES:
• Simple-to-Play and Fun!
• You can always get the first letter of the words in each level.
• Great brain-exercise
• 288 levels
